item.title: Me
item.description: William Quintal aka berlingoqc Hello my name is William Quintal , i’m a developer from the nation of Qu√©bec (currently trap in the country of Canada). I create this website to write about my experiences related to programmation, my opinions and to post release and stuff about my too many projects. Current job I’m currently working for Ticketmaster as a DevOps. Reach me You can reach me by email at: berlingoqc@gmail.
